name: Mail Debug for WooCommerce
author: Leanza Francesco

sections.description:
Mail Debug for WooCommerce allows you to debug WordPress and WooCommerce emails.
After installing and activating the plugin, you’ll see a new “Mail Debug” menu, in which you’ll be able to see each email sent by WordPress.
Furthermore, you can see additional information about the emails sent; you can view also an email preview.

Features:

  • A specific panel to see each email sent by WordPress.
  • Possibility to enable/disable debug.

Suggestions

If you have suggestions about how to improve Mail Debug for WooCommerce, you can write us so we can bundle them into Mail Debug for WooCommerce.

Translators

Available Languages

  • English (Default)

If you have created your own language pack, or have an update for an existing one, you can send gettext PO and MO file
write us so we can bundle it into Mail Debug for WooCommerce
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the downloaded zip file.
  2. Upload the plugin folder and upload it into the directory wp-content/plugins/ in your WordPress site.
  3. Activate Mail Debug for WooCommerce from Plugins page

Mail Debug for WooCommerce adds:
* a new entry in admin menu called “Mail Debug”, from which you can see each email sent by WordPress;
* a submenu called “Settings” in “Mail Debug” menu. Here you can find the plugin settings.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.3.0 – Released: Dec 24, 2022

  • New: see ‘from’ and ‘from name’ in email info meta-box
  • New: declared compatibility with WooCommerce ‘High-Performance Order Storage’ feature
  • Fix: non-localized strings

Version 1.2.2 – Released: Apr 16, 2021

  • New: support for WooCommerce 5.2
  • New: HTML code view
  • Fix: “array to string conversion” notice

Version 1.2.1 – Released: Mar 12, 2021

  • New: support for WooCommerce 5.1
  • New: support for WordPress 5.7

Version 1.2.0 – Released: Mar 10, 2020

  • New: support for WooCommerce 4.0
  • New: support for WordPress 5.4
  • New: option to move plugin menus into Tools and Settings menu
  • Tweak: improved style

Version 1.1.1 – Released: Jan 09, 2020

  • New: support for WordPress 5.3.x
  • New: support for WooCommerce 3.9
  • New: delete all debugs
  • New: include iCal and plan text for multipart emails
  • Fix: preview box title
  • Tweak: improved style

Version 1.1.0 – Released: Jun 06, 2019

  • New: email preview
  • New: search email debug
  • New: option to send all emails to a specific email address
  • New: support to WooCommerce 3.6.x
  • New: support to WordPress 5.2
  • New: option to send all emails to a specific email address
  • Tweak: prevent issues with WooCommerce Emails
  • Tweak: prevent issues when printing information in metabox
  • Tweak: improved style

Version 1.0.1

  • Initial release
